name: zkether-circuits
description: Circom circuits for zkETHer mobile app

scripts.setup: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 pot12_0000.ptau && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot12_0000.ptau pot12_0001.ptau --name='First contribution' -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot12_0001.ptau pot12_final.ptau -v
scripts.generate-zkey: snarkjs groth16 setup build/multiplier.r1cs pot12_final.ptau multiplier_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute multiplier_0000.zkey multiplier_final.zkey --name='First contribution' -v
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run setup && npm run generate-zkey
